Articles.Content:
EDIT: I narrowed the problem down to eve, as the crazy rainbow problem seemed to go away once i've took it out, however, no-reason crashing in the VAB still happens occasionally

Quite often when i load up a craft/create a new one, this happens, and then the game crashes, someone help? This doesn't happen everytime, and what parts i use doesnt seem to effect whether or not this happens, and it can also happen when reverting to VAB.

MODS INSTALLED:

Realism Overhaul with Astronomer's Visuals Interstellar V2 (6.4x scale stock system)

Active Texture (aggresive)

Hotrockets

VenStockRevamp

Version = 0.90

Edited December 30, 2014 by ganinian
